headline: ComEd Developing Next Generation of STEM Leaders During Black History Month
summary: CHICAGO, February 24, 2025--As part of its annual Black History Month celebration and to help diversify the pipeline of students pursuing careers in science, technology, engineering and math (STEM) fields, ComEd hosted its ComEd STEM Labs event in which local high school students learned about solar generation STEM careers while building their own solar-powered battery chargers alongside ComEd mentors.
